description: Details of External Lighting pursuant to condition 21 of deemed consent application Ref: P/2011/1352 dated 29/07/2011 for Construction of two storey extension to Academy on north side of building to provide teaching accommodation; single storey detached building adjacent to west boundary providing nursery, reception and Year 1 classrooms and ancillary space with associated landscaping; security hut at main site entrance; two single storey store and plant buildings and refuse/recycling store on north side of building; widening of footway from main site entrance, re-siting of access road on north side of building and associated alterations to car parking; modification to playing fields and open space; and removal of 5x temporary classroom buildings (Deemed Consent) (To View Plans See Ref:P/2011/5242)
